page.title: 11ROCKWELL GREEN CONT'D
page.content: The village has quite a large area of Council Housing.Some are in single roads,but the main area is Oaken Ground.However some of these Council Houses are now privately owned.The Primary School is situated in Oaken ground itself and has a substantial field for recreation. There are many individual,private houses in between the Council areas. The main village is on a small road which runs northerly from the A38.This road joins the B3187 at Tonedale.It passes through the newer Private housing area of Lower Westford,and continues past the older housing of Linden Estate.The main Linden House is now a Private Nursing Home.
